article_title: Wal-Mart Feels Pinch From China Austerity Campaign
article_text:
BEIJING—China’s austerity campaign has taken a toll on sales of high-end handbags and expensive jewelry. Now Wal-Mart Stores Inc. says it is feeling the effect, too.

The Bentonville, Ark., retailer’s same-store sales in China declined 1.6% from a year earlier for the quarter through July. One reason for the drop was lower sales of gift cards, moon cakes and other goods tied to China’s culture of gift giving, said Scott Price,...

twitter.description: Wal-Mart’s president for Asia said the retailer was feeling the effects of China’s austerity campaign.
twitter.title: Wal-Mart Feels Pinch From China Austerity Campaign

article_summary:
The Bentonville, Ark., retailer’s same-store sales in China declined 1.6% from a year earlier for the quarter through July.
Now Wal-Mart Stores Inc. says it is feeling the effect, too.
BEIJING—China’s austerity campaign has taken a toll on sales of high-end handbags and expensive jewelry.
One reason for the drop was lower sales of gift cards, moon cakes and other goods tied to China’s culture of gift giving, said Scott Price,...
